name: Markiploop
description:
Ah, Markiploop... the wonderous little lad who loves adventures. except... THERE ARE OBJECTS FALLING FROM THE SKY!!! AHHHH!
Play as the one and only Markiploop and dodge falling objects to gain a higher score and to beat numerous levels and worlds!


---FEATURES---
- 20+ levels to beat
- 8 different maps to play on
- 5 different Markiploops to unlock (oh, and Tiny Box Jim)
- totally sick music to play with!
- a harmfully addictive amount of gameplay that may just turn you into a descendant of the Markiploops


FOLLOW ME:
twitter @trevorpaskovics
instagram @trevor_paskovics





EXTRA NOTE TO MARK:
Mark, you're a truly inspiring human and i thank you for providing your amazing content to the world each and every day, i hope this can be something you can receive back for all of the happiness you have spread :)


DISCLAIMER:
This game is a fan-made game and is no way, shape, or form affiliated with Markiplier. Made for fans by a fan! for entertainment/enjoyment purposes
